dcterms:creator: S. Luz
F. Haider
S. de la Fuente
D. Fromm
B. MacWhinney
dcterms:description: The ADReSS Challenge dataset consists of 78 AD patients and 78 non-AD patients, where each participant describes the Cookie Theft picture from the Boston Diagnostic Aphasia Exam. The dataset is matched for gender and mitigates common biases in AD detection methods.
dcterms:title: ADReSS Challenge Dataset

dcterms:creator: L. Gauder
L. Pepino
L. Ferrer
P. Riera
dcterms:description: The ADReSSo Challenge dataset is utilized for extracting features from speech to recognize Alzheimer's disease using speech-based embeddings from pre-trained models.
dcterms:title: ADReSSo Challenge Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Al-Hameed
M. Benaissa
H. Christensen
dcterms:description: The DementiaBank dataset is used for detecting and predicting Alzheimer's disease severity in longitudinal acoustic data.
dcterms:title: DementiaBank Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Bertini
D. Allevi
G. Lutero
L. Calz√†
D. Montesi
dcterms:description: The DementiaBank dataset is employed to develop an automatic Alzheimer's disease classifier based on spontaneous spoken English.
dcterms:title: DementiaBank Dataset
